alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 06 at 6:03PM EDT until July 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 442 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST KENTUCKY LAWRENCE IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 20 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA CALHOUN CLAY JACKSON NICHOLAS ROANE IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA WIRT WOOD IN SOUTHERN WEST VIRGINIA BOONE FAYETTE KANAWHA LINCOLN LOGAN MCDOWELL MINGO PUTNAM RALEIGH WYOMING IN WESTERN WEST VIRGINIA CABELL MASON WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALUM CREEK, BECKLEY, CEREDO, CHAPMANVILLE, CHARLESTON, CLAY, CRAIGSVILLE, ELIZABETH, FAYETTEVILLE, GARY, GRANTSVILLE, HAMLIN, HARTS, HUNTINGTON, HURRICANE, KENOVA, LOGAN, LOUISA, MADISON, MAN, MULLENS, NEW HAVEN, OAK HILL, OCEANA, PARKERSBURG, PINEVILLE, POINT PLEASANT, RAVENSWOOD, RICHWOOD, RIPLEY, SAINT ALBANS, SOUTH CHARLESTON, SPENCER, SUMMERSVILLE, TEAYS VALLEY, VIENNA, WAR, WAYNE, WELCH, WILLIAMSON, AND YATESVILLE LAKE STATE PARK.
